snippet: When sending files using Dropbox, a service that stores documents in the cloud, it’s not necessary for the recipient to also use the service.
abstract: Personal Tech Q&A about sending files using Dropbox; embedding tweets on a blog; Tip of the Week on changing Facebook settings to see what preferred friends are up to.
lead_paragraph: When sending files using Dropbox, a service that stores documents in the cloud, it’s not necessary for the recipient to also use the service.

headline.main: Sharing Files via Dropbox With People Who Don’t Have an Account
